Replace.Text: Yours is a society to emulate. Arts, sciences… what don’t you have?
Your people are starved for knowledge and beauty, and yet you ignore science and art. Why?
I understand all too well, there are some opportunities one simply can't pass up.
If there's deception afoot, I prefer it when I am the one providing the intrigue.
